books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Dean Koontz
books.description: n the conclusion to the Odd Thomas series, Odd, who can communicate with the dead, returns home to small-town California.
books.name: SAINT ODD

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: Who will end up dead, and how, when three mothers with children in the same school become friends?
books.name: BIG LITTLE LIES

books.author: by Tami Hoag
books.description: Shaken by torture and rape at a serial killer’s hands, a TV reporter returns to her hometown, where she investigates the disappearance of a high school friend many years earlier.
books.name: COLD COLD HEART

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: An innocent college student falls in love with a tortured man with particular sexual tastes; the first of a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by Lisa Genova
books.description: A 50-year-old Harvard professor learns she has early-onset Alzheimer's disease; now a movie.
books.name: STILL ALICE

books.author: by Marie Force
books.description: In Book 8 of the Fatal series, Lt. Sam Holland of the Metropolitan Police defends two colleagues from allegations of scandal.
books.name: FATAL SCANDAL

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A downsized Wall Street lawyer joins a legal clinic in a small Virginia town, and litigates against the coal-mining industry.
books.name: GRAY MOUNTAIN

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: John Puller, a special agent with the Army, hunts for his brother, who was convicted of treason and has escaped from prison.
books.name: THE ESCAPE

books.author: by Harper Sloan
books.description: The six novels collected here follow the men of Corps Security, brought together by the Marines, as they pursue love.
books.name: CORPS SECURITY: THE SERIES

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman who was spared when her mother and sisters were murdered begins to reinvestigate the case against her imprisoned brother.
books.name: DARK PLACES

books.author: by J. S. Cooper and Helen Cooper
books.description: A romantic fling between two wedding guests is more complicated than they thought.
books.name: ONE NIGHT STAND

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: Detective Alex Cross’s family is kidnapped by a madman who wants to turn Cross into a perfect killer.
books.name: HOPE TO DIE
